articles.title: Texas floods leave at least 51 dead, 27 girls missing as rescuers search devastated landscape
articles.description: Catastrophic flooding in Texas has resulted in at least 51 fatalities and 27 girls missing, prompting extensive search and rescue operations [2, 4].

articles.title: Iran tells millions of Afghans to leave or face arrest on day of deadline
articles.description: Iran has ordered millions of Afghans to leave the country or face arrest as the deadline approaches [1].

articles.title: Israeli army continues bombing Gaza amid reports of ceasefire talks
articles.description: Despite ongoing ceasefire talks, the Israeli army is continuing its bombing campaign in Gaza [1].
